Posts.Content: Totally agree with everything. I have never been so scared about anything but the people in this group are amazing and make me realise I can do it. The pink glove dance is awesome :)
Posts.Title: This is the best BC forum!

Posts.Content: Hi. I also have just been diagnosed. I'm 29 years old and really scared. I'm waiting for treatment options to be discussed. I know with a positive attitude we can get through this xx Â
Posts.Title: Which Treatment 1st??

Posts.Content: Thank you for replying. It's really good to know there are people who we can chat with on here as none of my family/friends have been through this. So I'm trying to read up on things as much as possible but without trying to scare myself with the all the horror stories. I have 4 children 9,7,5 and 2 who are being a great help. With the help of our families I'm sure we'll get through it xx
Posts.Title: Which Treatment 1st??

Posts.Content: Hi shaz. I was only diagnosed 3 weeks ago. Very scary time all the waiting. Just know it does get easier. You just kinda come to terms with it. It's true though that you just want to start the treatment. I had to wait a week for the treatment plan but then had appointments the next 2 days then it was weekend then I had 3 more appointments after that. It was all just go. Hope you feel better soon x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed awaiting appointment
